title: Proposal for stoping non-SWP(except for ETH-USDT) liquidity farm! 暂停ETH-USDT以外的一池流动性挖矿
body:
Since LP Token Staking farm begin, SWP price drop from 2.5$ to 0.14$. 
》自从开始LP质押挖矿开始以来，SWP从2.5$崩盘到0.14$。

The speed of SWP release far exceeds the progress of community operations and product development !
》SWP释放的速度远远超过社群运营和产品开发的进度！

non-SWP pools are build for getting new users, but they need be controlled in right ratio.
》虽然非SWP的一池是为了吸引新用户，但需要控制在适当的比例。

This proposal is to suspend non-SWP pools (except for ETH-USDT) liquidity farm, and wait for the project team to release a roadmap that matches community operations, product development, and SWP price balance before opening new non-SWP pools. And temporarily adjust the weight of SWP-USDT to 95%, and ETH-USDT to 5%.
》本建议暂停一池(ETH-USDT以外)的流动性挖矿，等待项目团队出台社群运营、产品开发和SWP价格平衡相匹配的路线图后，再陆续开放新的一池。并且暂时调整SWP-USDT占比权重为95%，ETH-USDT占比权重为5%。

I am not a member of the project team, but I am the swapx fan stuck in  SWP-USDT pool.
》本人非项目团队成员，只是被套牢在SWP-USDT的swapx粉。
choices: suspend non-SWP pools (except for ETH-USDT) liquidity farm, and wait for the project team to release a roadmap that matches community operations, product development, and SWP price balance before opening new non-SWP pools. And temporarily adjust the weight of SWP-USDT to 95%, and ETH-USDT to 5%. 》暂停一池(ETH-USDT以外)的流动性挖矿，等待项目团队出台社群运营、产品开发和SWP价格平衡相匹配的路线图后，再陆续开放新的一池。并且暂时调整SWP-USDT占比权重为95%，ETH-USDT占比权重为5%。
author: 0x3c755a5bce7486DF9945455a0727ef3a54C3d7ef
